Dow down more than 300 points as fiscal reality hits

The Dow dove as investors absorbed the reality that the same political players in Washington, D.C. now must address the nation's so-called fiscal cliff. (Globe, 12:52 p.m.)

The US Marshal’s Service says James ‘‘Whitey’’ Bulger is back in jail, where’s he’s awaiting trial for 19 slayings. (AP, 8:54 a.m.)
